title: Sensor created to detect dopamine, brain disorders, in seconds

title_detail.value: Sensor created to detect dopamine, brain disorders, in seconds

summary: Using nanotechnology, researchers have developed the first rapid detector for dopamine, a chemical that is believed to play a role in various diseases such as Parkinson's, depression and some cancers.

summary_detail.value: Using nanotechnology, researchers have developed the first rapid detector for dopamine, a chemical that is believed to play a role in various diseases such as Parkinson's, depression and some cancers.
